message: Hey Bob, I'm selling this product that I think you'd really appreciate. I'm asking for $90 for it. Let me know what you think!
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate it. I'm willing to pay $85 for the product.
Thanks for the counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your interest. I'm willing to go down to $88 for the product. It's a great deal and I'm sure you'll love it. Let me know what you think!
